creator: suri.vaddiparthi@gmail.com
text:
Hi All,
Am trying to perform Load test for HP Quality center 10 using Jmeter2.12 and encountered with few issues.

I can able to record the samples with Jmeter, and add correlate the below dynamic values (Regular Expression Extractor)

LOGIN_SESSION_ID:347022,
LOGIN_SESSION_KEY:\\00000018\\lJdM+IqYsjYP6ViYzN2cdQ**,
Project_SessionID

ISSUE: when I reply the script am "NOT getting" RESPONSE DATA but request can be passed which we add correlation for samplers ((Regular Expression Extractor)). did any one encounter these issues with Jmeter when do load test for QC10 application?

please do let me know if we need to change any server settings/commendations Inorder to perform LT with Jmeter for QC10.

2015/02/27 17:08:04 INFO  - jmeter.samplers.SampleEvent: List of sample_variables: []

Thanks,
Surya

hi Team, please let me know if you need any info on this.
Am trying to perform loadtest with Jmeter v2.12 for HP Quality center 10.

is there any setting/recommendations in-terms of do load testing with Jmeter
creator: suri.vaddiparthi@gmail.com
sebb@apache.org
text:
Bugzilla is not a support forum.

Please subscribe to the JMeter user msiling list and ask there.
